'''Pekeho''' is a character in {{poe2}}.

## Background

{{Description|The fisherman lowers his head in greeting and wipes his hands on his sarong, which is mottled with fish guts. He doesn't meet your gaze, as befitting his lesser status in Huana culture.}}

## Interactions

{{Interactions
|companion       =
|wares           =
|stronghold      =
|rest            =
|quests_started  =
|quests_involved = [Plucked Fruit](/pluckedFruit/)
|none            = 
|other           = * Pekeho offers a bit of information about the caged lagufaeth
}}

## =Quests

=
* [Plucked Fruit](/pluckedFruit/): Pekeho accuses [Tamau](/tamau/) of stealing the last of the koiki fruit from the drying hut.
[Category:Tikawara characters](/categoryTikawaraCharacters/)

'''Pekeho''' is a character in {{poe2}}.

==Background==
{{Description|The fisherman lowers his head in greeting and wipes his hands on his sarong, which is mottled with fish guts. He doesn't meet your gaze, as befitting his lesser status in Huana culture.}}
